description: A criminologist, and one of Tenma`s former classmates. He helps Tenma by saving him from arrest, after selling him out, and also by acquiring information about Johan from all the criminals that Johan had met. He also helps Nina to recall her past, to the point of endangering his life. Rudy is able to get some insight about Johan and how he works, but despite all that he knows, he is still baffled by Johan`s actions. Dr. Gillen is also a former student of Dr. Reichwein.
name: Rudy Gillen
